Text: Fw Im a real racing driver now MikeHow is everything I know That you tried getting back to me a couple of weeks ago after I sent you the earlier email and we just keep missing each other Things move fast over here the race season is going OK and Ive managed not to kill myself yet We have had an offer of some sponsorship in the states to race in the Speedvision Touring Car championship so far weve got about of the that we need I am trying to get hold of the names of some companies in th US who sell to end users Joe Public and perhaps are not normally associated with racing big retailers that sort of thing I was wondering if you had any ideas all I need is about six or seven company names I can research the rest over the internet and send them some proposals via email If you have two minutes to email them to me that would be great Cheers John Original Message From John Batchelor mailto To mailto Sent Thursday August PM Subject Im a real racing driver now Mike Hi Mike Well I did it got the deal to do BTCC Touring Cars it has a similar profile here in the UK to Nascar but is actually very closely related to The Speedvision Touring Car Championship in the US Heres me and my teammate racing We are having a very good year but would like to do it in the US in can you give me a call on either or my cell phone which is Id like to pick your brains on a couple of things Can you believe people actually line up to get my autograph how weird is that Hope the family are well and look forward to talking to you soon John BQ its a long storybut I changed my name AGAIN to match the sponsors name so that when the commentary team on the TV talk about methey advertise the sponsors brand
